Title: Register with valid details
Steps: 1. Enter valid Name | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Test Data: Name: Rahul Sharma | Email: rahul@gmail.com | Password: Test@12345678
Expected Result: User is registered successfully and success message is displayed

Title: Register with empty Name
Steps: 1. Leave Name field empty | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Validation error message is displayed for Name field

Title: Register with Name less than 5 characters
Steps: 1. Enter Name with 4 characters | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Validation error message is displayed

Title: Register with Name more than 24 characters
Steps: 1. Enter Name with more than 24 characters | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Validation error message is displayed

Title: Register with invalid Email format
Steps: 1. Enter valid Name | 2. Enter invalid Email | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Validation error message is displayed for Email field

Title: Register with duplicate Email
Steps: 1. Enter valid Name | 2. Enter already registered Email | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Duplicate email error message is displayed

Title: Register with Password less than 12 characters
Steps: 1. Enter valid Name | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter short Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Password validation error message is displayed

Title: Register with Password without numeric value
Steps: 1. Enter valid Name | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter Password without numbers | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Password validation error message is displayed

Title: Register with mismatched Confirm Password
Steps: 1. Enter valid Name | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter Password | 4. Enter different Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Error message is displayed and registration is blocked

Title: Register with leading and trailing spaces
Steps: 1. Enter Name with spaces | 2. Enter Email with spaces | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Enter Confirm Password | 5. Click Register
Expected Result: Spaces are trimmed or validation error is displayed

Title: Login with valid credentials
Steps: 1. Navigate to Login page | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter valid Password | 4. Click Login
Expected Result: User is logged in successfully and redirected to Dashboard

Title: Login with invalid Password
Steps: 1. Navigate to Login page | 2. Enter valid Email | 3. Enter invalid Password | 4. Click Login
Expected Result: Error message is displayed for invalid credentials

Title: Login with unregistered Email
Steps: 1. Enter unregistered Email | 2. Enter any Password | 3. Click Login
Expected Result: Error message is displayed

Title: Login with empty Email and Password
Steps: 1. Leave Email empty | 2. Leave Password empty | 3. Click Login
Expected Result: Validation error messages are displayed

Title: Login with Email in uppercase
Steps: 1. Enter Email in uppercase | 2. Enter valid Password | 3. Click Login
Expected Result: Email is converted to lowercase and login is successful

Title: Access Dashboard after successful login
Steps: 1. Login successfully | 2. Navigate to Dashboard
Expected Result: Dashboard page is displayed successfully

Title: Access Dashboard without login
Steps: 1. Open Dashboard URL directly
Expected Result: User is redirected to Login page

Title: Access Dashboard with invalid or expired token
Preconditions: User token is invalid or expired
Steps: 1. Try accessing Dashboard
Expected Result: User is redirected to Login page

Title: Logout and access Dashboard
Steps: 1. Click Logout | 2. Try accessing Dashboard
Expected Result: Access is denied and Login page is displayed

Title: Multiple failed login attempts
Steps: 1. Enter wrong password repeatedly more than 10 times
Expected Result: Rate limit error message is displayed
